onmissing.message: Please, enter your date of birth.
Veuillez entrez votre date de naissance.

item.name: citizenship
item.label: Citizenship:
item.detailLabel: Minimum Requirements: Please enter the street address and ZIP Code before validating the address. Apt/Suite Number must be entered in Address Line 2.

item.name: emailRequired
item.label: To receive confirmation electronically as well as future updates:

item.name: group2Label
item.text: I am making a regular contribution to:

item.name: sectionDetailLabel
item.text: Debit dates falling on the 29th-31st of the month will be processed on the 28th.

item.name: copyAddress
item.detailLabel: Billing address same as donor address

item.name: cardPrintBank
item.text: Terms of Agreement: My authorization to transfer my regular pledge amount from my bank or credit card shall remain in effect until I notify the above named charity in writing, or by phone, that I wish to end this agreement and the authorized charity has had a reasonable time to act on it. A record of each payment will be included on my bank or credit card statement and will serve as my receipt.

item.name: sign3
item.label: Donor Signature
item.legalText: I have read and understand the terms and conditions.

item.name: receivedWp
item.label: Did the donor receive a Charity Welcome Information Package?

item.name: behalfPrint
item.text: On behalf of your chosen charity we would like to thank you for your generous support. To help us monitor and maintain our fundraising standards could you please complete the following:

item.name: firstGift
item.detailLabel: Did the fundraiser explain that the first gift will be processed today?

item.name: ongoing
item.detailLabel: Did the fundraiser make it clear that this is an ongoing monthly donation?

item.name: notOneTime
item.detailLabel: Has the fundraiser explained that this is not a program for one time donations?

item.name: monthly
item.detailLabel: Do you understand that a copy of your monthly giving agreement will be sent to the email account (if) provided?

item.name: clearIdentification
item.detailLabel: Was the fundraiser clearly displaying valid identification?

item.name: sign1
item.label: Please initial
item.detailLabel: I understand that my contributions will continue until I notify the above named charity of any change.

item.name: sign2
item.label: Please Sign here
item.detailLabel: I understand my gift will be ongoing. I am authorizing regular contributions and payment details.

item.name: finePrint
item.text:
Thank You for your support
1-855-654-4438 Toll-Free
www.fundraisinginitiatives.com
